subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Robert Karlsson of Sweden took a one-stroke lead in the Mercedes Benz Championship after shooting a three-under 69 in the second round. Karlsson is one of four Europeans at the tournament in Pulheim, Germany, preparing for next week’s Ryder Cup at Valhalla in Kentucky.
